directions: In a large bowl, beat the first five ingredients until blended; spread into an ungreased 9-in. pie plate. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese; top with bread crumbs. Bake at 400° for 25-30 minutes or until lightly browned. Serve with peppers and chips. Yield: 16 servings.
ingredients: 2	packages (8 ounces each) cream cheese, softened
½	cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese
¼	cup canned chopped green chilies
¼	cup canned diced jalapeno peppers
Sweet red and yellow pepper pieces and corn chips
title: Jalapeno Popper Spread Recipe
